nodes.text: TA-667 was a Triumphant-class dark trooper of the Galactic Empire. He operated alongside Commander Zhanks sometime following 0 BBY.

TA-667 was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011.
